title: The Big Get Bigger. The Strong Get Stronger.
description: Jim Hays, President of Wells Fargo Advisors, discusses the evolution of advisory teams, the impact of RegBI and how to tackle the industry's diversity challenge.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Jim Hays, President of Wells Fargo Advisors, discusses the evolution of advisory teams, the impact of RegBI and how to tackle the industry's diversity challenge.
